concept.title: How to Get Involved
concept.shortdesc: The best ways to contribute are by finding and reporting bugs, participating in the DITA-OT project meetings, and contributing to the code and documentation.

section.title: Report a bug
section.p: We use Github as our issue tracker.

section.title: Participate in the project meetings
section.p: The DITA-OT project holds monthly meetings. The meetings usually are held on Tuesday, 10-11 AM ET. To get an invitation, send e-mail to Robert Anderson, project lead and primary contributor.

section.title: Contribute to the documentation
section.p: To contribute to the documentation, send e-mail to Kristen Eberlein.
